subject: This week's component news: $25,000 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

This week we've got $25,050 in new design and development competitions, including our first C++ Development Competitions. Here are this week's projects:

DESIGN: $13,200 in prizes.
* Java JSF Spell Check Version 1.0 ($1,000.00)
* Java JSF Interactive Table Version 1.0 ($1,000.00)
* .NET Object Factory Configuration API Plugin Version 1.0 ($400.00)
* Java Data Entitlement Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java DB Connection Factory Version 1.1 ($800.00)
* Java Authentication Manager Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET File Based Configuration Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java File Upload Version 2.1 ($400.00)
* Java Functional Entitlement Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Project Phase Task Management Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET XAML Viewer Version 1.0 ($1,200.00)
 Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=112

DEVELOPMENT: $11,850 in prizes.
* Custom .NET MDX Fixed Expressions Version 1.0 ($700.00)
* Custom .NET MDX MTM Expressions Version 1.0 ($700.00)
* Java Document Searcher Version 1.1 ($700.00)
* Java Linux FS Tests Version 1.0 ($1,200.00)
* Custom Java Titan Segment Verification Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* C++ Titan Segment Service Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET Constants Depot Version 2.0 ($500.00)
* .NET Conversation Manager Data Entities Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET Named Query Builder Version 1.1 ($200.00)
* Java Remote Execution Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* C++ Titan Metadata Service Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Base Exception Version 2.0 ($500.00)
 Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113


Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team


===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
